show.title: Investing in Regenerative Agriculture and Food

title: 59 Isabella Tree, rewilding a 3,500 acre British farm that was never profitable before
subtitle: 59 Isabella Tree, rewilding a 3,500 acre British farm that was never profitable before
summary:
An interview with Isabella Tree, author of the book Wilding: The Return of Nature to a British Farm.

----------------------------------------------------------

Welcome to Investing in Regenerative Agriculture and Food.
Join our Gumroad community, discover the tiers and benefits here: www.gumroad.com/investinginregenag.

www.Ko-fi.com/regenerativeagriculture. 

-----------------------------------------------------------

I spoke with Isabella Tree about her book Wilding and the Knepp experiment, the pioneering rewilding project she runs in West Sussex with her husband, the environmentalist Charlie Burrell, using free-roaming grazing animals to create new habitats for wildlife.

All show notes and links can be found here:
www.investinginregenerativeagriculture.com/2019/09/18/isabella-tree.
